entry.title: Placon - SDLM-2 Clear Plastic Dome Lid For 24 Oz Salad Bowl - 300/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Placon
Type: Disposables
Price: 89.99

Placon - Clear Plastic Dome Lids For 24 Oz Salad Bowls - 300 / Case

Keep your Bowls contained with this clear plastic lid! Perfect for presenting greens, fruits, and pre-made entrees, this clear plastic lid is ideal for take-out orders and fast food restaurants, along with portion storage and display in grocery stores and delis! To ensure the contents stay fresh and isolated from their surroundings, this lid tightly seals food inside while allowing for taller, larger sandwiches, desserts, and other items to be placed inside.

Not only does this lid lock in freshness to give your customers the best quality food, this lid is crack-resistant, giving you peace of mind when it comes to leaks or breaking. Additionally, having a clear construction allows your customers and employees to have quick product identification, and showcases your vibrant colored products.

entry.title: Placon - ST16LH - Dome Lids For 16" Square Catering Tray - 50/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Placon
Type: Disposables
Price: 64.99

Placon - ST16LH - Dome Lids For 16" Square Catering Tray - 50/Case

Crystal disposable clear dome lids offer a tight seal without sacrificing product visibility. Super Bowls to provide your guests with optimum protection for their take out or leftovers. Made of durable OPS, these lids feature a unique design that allows for sturdy and reliable stacking.

Dimensions: 16.32 x 16.32 x 3.27

Keeps Contaminants Out

Because this lid easily snaps onto your 12" catering trays with a secure seal, you can keep dust and debris away from your food on display or during transportation.

Easy-to-lift Tab

Once the lid is secured onto the tray, this easy-to-lift tab allows you to quickly remove the lid without disturbing the contents of your tray so you can keep your unique presentations intact.

Conveniently Stackable

This lid can be stacked together with other lids for compact storage, saving you valuable space in your supply closet. Also great for transportation, you can stack this lid in your catering van to bring additional supplies with you to each event!

entry.title: Placon - ST16T - 16" Black Square Catering Tray - 50/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Placon
Type: Disposables
Price: 87.99

Placon - ST16T - 16" Black Square Catering Tray - 50/Case

Catering Tray Black plastic catering / deli tray is perfect for displaying hors d'oeuvres, cheeses, and desserts at your next party or catered meal. A clear plastic dome lid is also available (sold separately) to help you keep your platters fresh and free of contaminants. For your convenience, this tray makes cleanup a breeze! Simply dispose of the tray when you are finished using it.

Raised Edges

The raised edges help keep your food displays on the tray where they belong, so you spend less time cleaning up messes.

Space-Saving Convenience

Since the tray is stackable, it's incredibly simple to store, and great for transporting from place to place.

Sleek Black Color

Use this tray's black coloring to complement the vibrant colors of your food presentations.

entry.title: Vespa - VEL-029 - 6 Compartment Serving Tray - 50/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vespa
Type: Disposables
Price: 12.99

Vespa - VEL-029 - 6 Compartment Serving Tray - 50/Pack

This tray is perfect to help increase all-around efficiency in your school, hospital, or correctional facility. This tray features 6 separate compartments  it is guaranteed to be durable and impact-resistant.

With six compartments, the school meal tray is durable and secure enough for hot and cold foods. This tray is ideal for cafeteria and commissary use. Great also for separating dressings and sauces from breads and pasta, our compartment school food trays will help keep your meal fresh and appetizing!

entry.title: Caterline - APB320BL - 320 Oz 16" PET Black Salad Bowl - 25/Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: WNA Caterline
Type: Disposables
Price: 98.99

WNA - APB320BL - 320 Oz Black Salad Bowl - 25/Case

Offer salads and pastas to-go with this WNA Caterline Catering Bowl Black!

This black bowl combines style with a nice large size, able to accommodate a variety of offerings. Its shape offers a classic look. Simply pair it with a compatible lid (sold separately) for easy transportation, or use it to serve large salads that guests can share.

Great for Buffets

This bowl is large enough to accommodate a take-out meal or large salad to-go. Thanks to its capacity, it can even be incorporated into your buffet or salad bar!

Heavy Weight Plastic

Made of heavy weight plastic, this strong and sturdy plate is perfect for your restaurant, party, event, or catering service. Lighter than chinaware options, it is not as fragile or costly so you don't have to worry about extra breakage expenses.

Adds Style to Presentation

An upscale alternative to standard disposable bowls, it offers a trendy and chic look with the convenience of plastic dinnerware. A sleek black color adds a unique flair to pastas, rolls, and other offerings.

CaterLine® Pack N Serve

 320 oz. (16”) PET Round Bowl

Ti x Hi, 4 x 3
